title: Tapo SolarCam C403 Kit, Outdoor Battery Camera w/Solar Panel, Wireless, 1080P, Free Person Detection, SD/Cloud Storage, Color Night Vision, Built-in Spotlights & Alarm, No Hub Needed, Black
description: Enhance your home security with the Tapo SolarCam C403 KIT, a versatile, solar-powered wireless outdoor camera system. Its innovative design allows for flexible setup, either as a unified unit or separately with a 13 ft cable. Enjoy continuous solar power, with just 45 minutes* of sunlight providing a full day’s charge and a 180-day* battery reserve for cloudy periods. Featuring Color Night Vision, 1080P Live View, and Free Person/Vehicle Detection, this camera ensures top-tier security with real-time alerts. Adaptable storage options include microSD card (up to 512GB)* and Tapo Care cloud service. Prioritize your privacy with encrypted video and two-factor authentication. The Tapo SolarCam C403 KIT offers seamless, reliable security for both indoor and outdoor use. *𝗗𝗶𝘀𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗿𝘀: 1. 45 min of sunlight is based on standard environmental conditions (1000W/m2, 25°C, AM1.5) and specified working scenes (up to 100 events triggered per day). The actual required time of sunlight may vary. 2. 180-day battery life is based on Tapo laboratory tests with 250s of use per day. The time of use includes recording and watching live views. Actual battery life may vary due to device settings, usage, router specifications, and environmental factors. 3. MicroSD card purchased separately. Actual storage capacity depends on the size of the microSD card used. 4. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant supported displays. User experience is dependent on the connected device’s specifications.
